item.title: Alarm being going off since friday, 30th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bazalgette Way, London

item.title: Tree large seed droppings. Not cleaned in over a month. Dangerous for everyone as can slip on, 30th September
item.description:
Issue is ongoing. The tree should be got rid of as you just canâ€™t park with out car damage as the seeds are hard and heavy. When ripe they splatter purple sap on cars. Have had to wash my car twice a week. Also in both are gardens. No other trees on our street are like this.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clarence Road, Bickley, London
Report on FixMyStreet
